titles.title: A bill to permit issuance of a certificate of documentation for employment in the coastwise trade of the United States for the vessel PAVLOF.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.
Referred to Subcommittee on Merchant Marine.

bill.summary: 6/15/1988--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to cause a named vessel to be documented as a vessel of the United States entitled to engage in the coastwise trade.
